name: Quiz Party
description: Quiz Party offers you a unique and inclusive experience which can be enjoyed by everyone, and with an unlimited number of players you can truly put everyone's general knowledge to the test!

name: Quick Fill Q
description: Quick Fill Q is a simple game where you have to fill the holes in the ground so the pink ball can keep rolling. When Q rolls past a certain distance, Q begins to speed up. When the game ends, the distance traveled by Q is recorded. Quick Fill Q is a non-stop, easy to learn puzzle game that provides hours of fun for the entire family.

name: Rive: Ultimate Edition
description: Rive: Ultimate Edition is a metal wrecking, robot hacking shooter.

name: Riverside
description: Sin descripción

name: Riding Star 3D
description: Become a world champion in the most realistic 3D riding simulation!

name: Riding Stables 3D
description: An exciting 3D horse adventure awaits you!

name: Rhythm Core Alpha 2
description: Rhythm Core Alpha 2 is an advanced music creation and performance tool.

name: Rhythm Core Alpha
description: Rhythm Core Alpha is an advanced music creation system for the Nintendo DSi.

name: Retro Road Rumble
description: Fast Paced, Head to Head Racing Action

name: Robot Rescue
description: A robotic DSiWare puzzler!

name: Robot Rescue 2
description: If you're tired of "brain-bending logic games" that your kid brother can solve, it's time for Robot Rescue 2!

name: Robot Rescue 3D
description: Guide trapped robots through treacherous passages, staying clear of paralyzing electrical circuits and sliding past sleeping mines!

name: Roller Angels
description: Roller Angels is a side-scrolling platform game in which an alien race known as the Monodrones is stealing the town’s precious colors. It’s up to the Roller Angels to roll into action and restore color to their beloved town. With the help of Dr. Lionel, who developed a special spray paint, the angels use the spray paint to bring color back.

name: Rogue Aces
description: It's time to join the Rogue Aces and liberate the islands from The Baron and his dreaded pilots. Will you be able to face the fiercest of foes with only one life and three planes?

name: Rocks N' Rockets
description: Are you ready to take the hero's seat in this gripping arcade game?

name: Rummikub
description: For more than 50 years, players have loved Rummikub for its combination of tactical thinking, luck and tense competition.

name: RTO
description: Your team has been spread out, enemies are approaching rapidly. It's only a matter of time until it's all over.

name: Rorrim
description: Rorrim is a puzzle/maze game suitable for all ages. Help the princess escape the dungeon both in the mirror world and the real one.

name: Shanghai Wii
description: A Japanese Wii import game, based on the popular oriental board game.

name: Shanghai Mahjong
description: Bamboos, Circles, Winds, Dragons: assemble splendid 3D tiles by traditional colour and clear the playing area to win!

name: Shanghai DS
description: A Shanghai game by Sunsoft, only released in Japan

name: Shadow Archer
description: Welcome to the Darker Realm! The arrows are limited! The enemies are not!

name: Secret Empires of the Ancient World
description: Search for secrets among the ruins of great ancient civilizations!

name: Secret Agent Files: Miami
description: Probably the most challenging adventure to date for Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 2DS.

name: SDK Spriter
description: All-in-one retro game asset studio. Create character and level pixel art. Export your creations to share with all.

name: SDK Paint
description: Paint across five stacked canvas layers. View your artwork hanging on the walls. Share your creations in 2D and 3D.

name: Absolutely Unstoppable MineRun
description: A challenging auto-runner for 1 to 5 players.

name: Absolute Reversi
description: This reversi game is for all players at any level.

name: Absolute Baseball
description: Become the manager of a baseball team and lead it to the championship.

name: Aahh! Spot the Difference
description: Demonstrate your skills of observation in this addictive "Spot the Difference" game!

name: Adventure Party: Cats and Caverns
description: Like a tabletop RPG without the table. Every party should be an adventure!

name: Adventure Labyrinth Story
description: Adventure Labyrinth Story is a rogue-like RPG that challenges the unknown dungeon.

name: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima IV
description: Fourth and final 8-bit installment of the series, only released in Japan on the Famicom system. Took the game from being a straight-on platformer and added some adventuring and RPG elements to the mix.

name: Akari by Nikoli
description: Akari by Nikoli contains 50 Akari.

name: Check Your 6!
description: Check Your 6! brings you in the middle of the World War II battles with a turn-based game that carries the spirit of the dogfights.

name: Shooting Range by Thornbury Software
description: Shooting Range by Thornbury Software is a carnival style shooting gallery where you test your shooting skills in the time you're allowed for each level.

name: Shoot the Ball
description: In Shoot the Ball, your objective is simple - use the touch screen to "shoot" the ball into the open space scoring a point. Each shape is randomly given a speed and colour to increase the difficulty. Challenge your family and friends to beat your session score. How many times can you Shoot the Ball?

name: Goat Runner
description: A difficult platform runner game with nice pixel art. You need to run and jump with a crazy goat to reach the goal. But be careful there are funny enemies, lava and fire drops falling from heaven.

name: Snakenoid Deluxe
description: The game is an unique blend of classic game concepts.

name: Snakenoid
description: Snakenoid is an unique blend of the Snake and Arkanoid game concepts.

name: Snake Den
description: Use cunning, quick reflexes, and sheer luck to grow a tail to brag about.

name: Snail Mail
description: Guide Turbo the Snail as he rushes to deliver Intergalactic Mail throughout the furthest reaches of the universe in Snail Mail, a fast-paced racing adventure from Sandlot Games for the WiiWare service.

name: SmileBasic
description: Let's play in programming! Create, Pop-up and Carry around!

name: Smash Table Tennis
description: This table tennis game was originally released only in Japan for the Famicom Disk System.

name: Smash Bowling 3D
description: Get ready to smash the boundaries of handheld bowling with Smash Bowling 3D on the Nintendo 3DS from Big John Games.

name: Smash Cat Heroes
description: Slash and smash enemies coming at you from all directions in non-stop cat-attack action "Smash Cat Heroes"!

name: Sleep Clock: Record and Analyse Your Sleep Patterns
description: Sleep Clock is not just an alarm clock: you can use it to record and analyse your sleeping patterns, which helps you to manage your sense of well-being.

name: AfterZoom
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Island II: Aliens in Paradise
description: Jeannie Jungle has been captured by aliens!

name: Ancient Tribe
description: In the ancient world of Savage, you play the god of an ancient tribe in this real-time strategy game. Expand your village by guiding its inhabitants on the hunting grounds to find food and resources. Use them to upgrade your village and increase its population.

name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle
description: Step into SpeedThru: Potzol’s Puzzle, a 3D Aztec-themed action puzzle game that will test your wits and your reactions, available exclusively from Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS.

name: SphereZor
description: With its classic Arcade Style feel, SpherZor takes you back to the good old days of gaming. But no need to wait in line and count your coins at the Arcade, you can get the unlimited SphereZor experience in the comfort of your own home. Enjoy crossover gameplay inspired by classic games you’d find in an 80's arcade. In 70 challenging Levels, help SphereZor and SphereZora to escape the TriZors. And if you like, share the SphereZor fun with up to 4 additional players to battle it out with you. Guide SphereZor through challenging environments and level hazards to collect all the Power Cores, beware the evil TriZors they will stop you at all costs from saving the land of SphereZoria.

name: Space Invaders
description: Experience one of gaming's iconic franchises in this perfect rendition of the arcade classic!

name: Space Hunted
description: You are Jade Hunter, an intergalactic treasure hunter. While traveling past an uncharted planet, your ship was shot down. Now Jade is an intruder, an alien, on this uncharted planet, and is being hunted down. Your mission is to survive and escape the planet! Travel through 128 levels! Avoid and defeat enemies to survive! Collect powers to ensure your survival! Do you have what it takes to survive in Space Hunted? Or will you be hunted down?

name: Splashy Duck
description: Save the duck from crashing into the whale!

name: Kersploosh!
description: In Kersploosh!, where gravity is your greatest enemy, you play as the stone; or iron ball, jewel and yet more items bizarrely discarded into the abyss.

name: Spirit Hunters Inc. Shadow/Light
description: Spirit Hunters Inc: Shadow and Spirit Hunters Inc: Light are augmented reality games in which the player works for Spirit Hunters Inc, a mysterious company which specialises in the detection, capture and trade of ghostly spirits.

name: Sssnakes
description: Sssnakes is a new twist on the classic snake video game. It is an upgrade for modern times without giving up its essence.

name: Spot the Differences: Party!
description: The most complete difference game on Wii U, with 360 pictures and 3,600 differences to find! Play solo or with up to 3 friends, and see who is the quickest spotter!

name: Shapo
description: Shapo is a challenge that will keep you on the edge!

name: Secret Mysteries in New York
description:
Help the police to find the killer
Beautiful 3D scenes
Incredible gameplay

name: Secret Mysteries in London
description: 1920. When a politician is found murdered in the park, the local police make the unconventional decision to ask Oscar Gaebelein, a young forensic scientist, for help. Motivated by his desire to prove his value to the investigating team, Oscar throws himself head first into the investigation. But soon, he and his colleagues find out that this first murder is only the beginning of a sinister bread crumb trail.

name: Secret Journeys: Cities of the World
description: Explore Venice, Mumbai, Beijing and Nairobi on a globetrotting seek and find adventure.

name: Step Up!
description: Step Up brings you professional trainers specialized in aerobic step workouts, to help you burn all the calories you ever dreamed of.

name: Samurai Defender
description: Samurai Defender is a simple defense type action game set in the Warring States period of Japan.

name: Safari Quest
description: Embark on a quest to find the white lion in this exciting puzzle safari!

name: Rytmik: Rock Edition
description: Rytmik Rock Edition is a pocket music station.

name: Rytmik World Music
description: Rytmik World Music is an application for creating rhythmical and melodic themes and for composing whole songs.

name: Rytmik Retrobits
description: Rytmik Retrobits is a pocket music station.

name: RV-7 My Drone
description: At some point, on the news or in documentaries, we've all seen the different applications that these devices have, from humanitarian to military.

name: Runbow: Pocket Deluxe Edition
description: The Runbow Pocket Deluxe Edition includes the critically acclaimed Wii U party game with all the DLC.

name: Real Heroes Firefighter 3D
description: In this first-person fire & rescue action game players will enter the soot-stained boots of an everyday hero as a newly graduated academy cadet getting their start in a big city fire station.

name: Sudoku 50! For Beginners
description: Sudoku Student brings you the first Nintendo DSiWare sudoku experience with all the features you’d expect.

name: Sudoku and Permudoku
description: Sudoku and Permudoku is a puzzle game that offers two distinct styles of logic puzzles.

name: Sudoku 150! For Challengers
description: Sudoku 150! For Challengers (Sudoku Master in US) offers 150 unique puzzles that beginners and experts alike will enjoy.

name: Sudoku Party
description: There are 1,000 exclusive puzzles to solve on your own, or co-operatively with a friend.

name: Super Destronaut 3D
description: Fight against waves of invaders in this arcade space shooter and collect power-ups to increase your fire power. Try to beat your high-score in Classic or Time Attack mode. If you like classic arcade shooters then you will love Super Destronaut 3D.

name: Super Destronaut 2: Go Duck Yourself
description: Fight against endless waves of invaders in this arcade space shooter game!

name: Earth Defense Force
description: An evil organization, named AGYMA, threatens the 200 years of peace the galaxy has enjoyed. It was released for the SNES and also as a view-limited downloadable game for the Satellaview that was broadcast in at least 3 runs between August 31, 1997 and February 28, 1998. The "E.D.F." from the game's title is an acronym for "Earth Defense Force," however the official name of the game employs the acronym and not the full expression.

name: Super C
description: The alien Red Falcon is back, and planning on taking over the planet Earth.

name: Super Mario All-Stars: Limited Edition
description: Super Mario All-Stars Limited Edition is a Mario special edition pack for the Wii released as a Wii emulation of the SNES game Super Mario All-Stars. The game is a tribute to the 25th anniversary of Super Mario Bros. and includes an extra package, with a Super Mario History 1985-2010 booklet, that tells about Mario's history and the people who made a big effort making the Mario games, and a CD with many songs across the main series. The game itself is a unaltered emulation of Super Mario All-Stars for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, down to showing the SNES controller in the configuration screen rather than any of the standard Wii controllers.

name: Super Hero Math
description: It's a bird, it's a plane, no, it's SUPER HERO MATH!

name: Clone Hero
description: Clone Hero is a free rhythm game, which can be played with any 5 or 6 button Guitars, Drums (knockoffs, MiDis and from official guitar hero or rock band series), Gamepad Controllers, or just your standard computer keyboard. Download the game, copy your song charts into the song folder and enjoy hours of fun!

name: Mercenary Kings: Reloaded Edition
description: In this frantic 2D action game, you are part of the Mercenary Kings, the most skilled team of warriors-for-hire on Earth, but when your comrades have fallen and the fearsome forces of CLAW have seized an island-wide top secret Laboratory Base, you must do what it takes to stop them.

name: Black Hole
description: An action-packed space shooter.

name: Anonymous Notes: Chapter 4 - From the Abyss
description: Play serious! A true action RPG! Defeat all the flock of monster looming!

name: 99Moves
description: After 99Bullets and 99Seconds, the saga continues. Now your problem will be the movements.

name: 2064: Read Only Memories Integral
description: 2064: Read Only Memories is a new cyberpunk adventure that will take you on a journey of puzzle-solving and exploring as you investigate the mysterious world and characters of Neo-San Francisco.

name: Zoo Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Zoonies: Escape from Makatu
description: Leo the lion crashes his plane deep within the dark jungle.

name: Zombie Blaster
description: Fight off hordes of the undead as they seek out the living in Zombie Blaster. Struggle for survival as infected, snarling zombies try to turn you into a mindless decaying corpse with a hunger for human flesh. Armed with deadly weapons, you must fight your way through the living dead or find yourself walking among them.

name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
description: The only "parody runner" style game on Wii U. Join the Zombie Brigade and travel around the world, meet interesting people, and BITE THEIR BRAINS.

name: Zimo: Mahjong Fanatic
description: Zimo: Mahjong Fanatic is much more than a simple matching game. Zimo uses real mahjong rules with an innovated game play that will challenge your timing, skill, and luck. Clear all 45 challenging levels and earn your place in the top ten.

name: Zig Zag Go
description: Use the touch screen to switch directions quickly and avoid oncoming shapes. Endless fun for everyone!

name: Yakari: The Mystery of Four - Seasons
description: Step into the shoes of our hero in his new adventure!

name: Y.A.S.G
description: Defend your planet! Y.A.S.G is an old-school arcade shooter, where your goal is to defend your planet from danger. Shoot enemy ships and asteroids that wish to destroy your home. But be aware, that some of them can fight back. If your home is destroyed it's game over. Get as many points as possible. Beat your records. You can always ask a friend to join you - double the player, double the fun!

name: Working Dawgs: Rivet Retriever
description: Building the latest construction project requires teamwork, quick reflexes, and dogged determination!

name: Word Wizard 3D
description: Classic word games that are addictive and absorbing with endless fun gameplay

name: Words Up! Academy
description: Becoming part of the Academy is not easy; its most illustrious members are waiting for you, ready to challenge you in this extraordinary puzzle and skills game. Prove your mastery of language in WordsUp! Academy... and dare to challenge them and get their approval!

name: Word Searcher 4
description: Word Searcher 4 contains fun words from categories such as Fossils, Literature and Tornadoes.

name: Forza Motorsport 7: Deluxe Edition
description: The Forza Motorsport 7 Deluxe Edition includes the Day One Car Pack and VIP membership. Buy the Forza Motorsport 7 Deluxe Edition and receive two custom driver gear.

name: Forza Motorsport 7: Ultimate Edition
description: The Forza Motorsport 7 Ultimate Edition includes the Forza Motorsport 7 Car Pass, the Day One Car Pack, and VIP membership. Buy the Forza Motorsport 7 Ultimate Edition and receive two custom driver gear.

name: Where's Wally? Fantastic Journey 2
description:
Where's Wally? Fantastic Journey 2 is the second slice of the stripey one's retail appearance, so it shouldn't come as much of a surprise to you that it follows the exact same template as previous release Where's Wally? Fantastic Journey 1.
The aim of the game is to find Wally and his friends over four levels, with each environment offering specific characters and items to play too.

name: Where's Wally? Fantastic Journey 3
description:
Keep up the search for Wally, his friends and more in Fantastic Journey 3!
Based on the hit publishing series, Where's Wally? Fantastic Journey 3 provides the ultimate search and find fun inside the magical worlds of The Unfriendly Giants, The Underground Hunters, The Land of Waldos and many more! Challenge friends or go solo as you search for hidden items, and be ready for surprises and sabotage to fuel the fun!

name: Toss n Go
description: This exciting title is the first game from RCMADIAX that two players can enjoy at the same time.

name: Topoloco
description: A fun way to learn world topography. Impress your friends at school and explore the atlas covering five continents.

name: Toon Tanks
description: Want to be a Tank Commander?

name: Top Model 3D
description: Do you have what it takes to be the next Top Model?

name: Titans Tower
description: Climb the tower and grab the loot! In Titans Tower, jump the walls of the castle tower grabbing as much loot as you can. Many obstacles will stand in your way, but the reward is very big. Catch power-ups along the way to enhance your journey while capturing a high score!

name: Tiny Games: Knights & Dragons
description: Tiny Games – Knights & Dragons is the first in a series of minigame collections for kids. Its look and gameplay are designed for kids, and the games offer a diverting experience with age-appropriate session lengths.

name: Tiny Galaxy
description: Tiny Galaxy is an action platformer. You play as a blue square, Orion, as you race through the "tiny galaxy", jumping from planet to planet to try and retrieve your stolen headphones.

name: ThruSpace
description: ThruSpace is an exciting puzzle game in which you move and rotate an object called a keydron through gaps in walls.

name: The Voice: I Want You
description: The Voice video game brings all the excitement of the hit TV show to your living room.

name: The Very Hungry Caterpillar's ABCs
description: The Very Hungry Caterpillar's ABCs is an educational game based on the children's book The Very Hungry Caterpillar.

name: The Stonecutter
description:
Experience an ancient Chinese tale. Multiple endings, choose your own path in this visual Novel.

A poor stonecutter notices the lifestyles of those higher in the social hierarchy and wishes to become them. A spirit hears his plea and grants his wish. Decide The Stonecutter's fate by choosing what he should wish for!

name: The Seller
description: Once a big-time boss, you are now down and out, forced into the small time after your company was driven into bankruptcy by an underhanded competitor who stooped lower than even you would dare.

name: ZaciSa's Last Stand
description: ZaciSa's Last Stand is a simple, yet challenging, 2D tower defense game set in space.

name: Yoga Master
description:
Yoga Master is the first wellness game of its kind built entirely in 3D and designed by experts to help you reach the perfect balance between mind and body.
Thanks to the collaboration of international professional yoga coaches, Yoga Master is the first wellness game of its kind built entirely in 3D and designed by experts to help you reach the perfect balance between mind and body.

With a wide range of programs, lessons and more than 150 poses from classic to urban yoga, you'll be mentored by a coach who will accurately show you exercises step by step, performing them with you.

name: Xavier
description: Help Xavier on his journey to become an adult in this prehistoric themed side-scroller. Face difficult challenges, explore and conquer the world untouched by man. Adapt to overcome any obstacle in every enviroment. Find hidden treasures and defeat enemies standing in your way.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom
description:
"Enjoy your life in an open world as you see fit. Explore, fight, harvest, love, marry, parent -- a truly laid-back gaming experience that is sure to bring a smile to your face. A living and breathing fantastical world awaits you within a game console.

Forests and rivers, farms, pastures, mines, schools, churches, and an imperial castle... all fully realized and explorable! But that's not all... the lives of the residents there are fully simulated in spectacular detail! Interacting with the residents of the world using real communication may even make you think that you're playing an MMORPG. You could fall in love, get married, and have a child... then pass on your legacy to your child and continue playing.

One lifetime in this world offers a completely unique storyline each time you play. An experience that transcends conventional games, becoming a cherished memory that you'll hold in your heart forever."

name: WordsUp! Academy
description: Becoming part of the Academy is not easy; its most illustrious members are waiting for you, ready to challenge you in this extraordinary puzzle and skills game. Prove your mastery of language in WordsUp! Academy... and dare to challenge them and get their approval!

name: Word Searcher 3
description: You'll need a keen eye and a quick mind to complete 100 themed word-search puzzles.

name: Word Searcher 2
description: You'll need a sharp eye and a quick mind to complete 100 themed word- search puzzles.

name: Word Search 10K
description: With more than 10,000 words hidden in a grid of 90,000 letters, Word Search 10K is the largest, word search ever made!

name: Worcle Worlds
description: Words in a circle!

name: Zombii Attack
description: Zombii Attack is an arcade survival game.

name: Zombie Slayer Diox
description: Zombie Slayer Diox is a rhythm-action game with a side-scrolling twist!

name: Zombie Skape
description: Escape from a Zombie invasion

name: Zombie Panic in Wonderland DX
description: The deluxe version of the successful Zombie Panic in Wonderland! The game is completely renewed for this version. Let's set out on a grand adventure to save Wonderland from the zombies destroying all in their way!

name: Zenquaria: Virtual Aquarium
description: Zenquaria turns your TV into a living aquarium.

name: ZaciSa: Defense of the Crayon Dimensions!
description: ZaciSa: Defense of the Crayon Dimensions! is a simple, yet challenging, 2D tower defense game set in space.

name: Gyakuten Kenji 2
description: Gyakuten Kenji 2, also referred to as "Ace Attorney Investigations 2" by Capcom staff, is the sequel to "Gyakuten Kenji" (known as "Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth" in English) and the sixth game in the "Ace Attorney" series of text adventure video games.

name: Advanced Circuits
description: Whether with a train, a car or a tank, are you ready for a new challenge? This brain-boggling puzzle game will put your powers of deduction to the test. Complete the circuits by connecting squares on the game board with pieces of track. Some pieces of track are already shown on the board at the beginning of the game to give you a head start. There is only one solution to each puzzle. The rules are simple but the challenges are tough.

name: Adventure In Vegas: Slot Machine
description: Try your luck playing on three slot machines: Hawaiian, Pirate Treasure and Mexican Heat.

name: Artillery: Knights vs. Orcs
description: In "Artillery: Knights vs. Orcs" the knights and orcs fight from a distance with their powerful cannons.

name: Art Style: Rotozoa
description: Take an unusual journey into a microscopic world in this unique action game from the genre-redefining Art Style series.

name: Armillo
description: Rock and roll your way through a colourful world in Armillo, a sci-fi-style rolling platformer. In a once-peaceful galaxy, invading Darkbot forces are cruelly capturing small, blue critters. Flying from planet to planet, help Armillo rescue them and take back his home: a series of spherical 3D worlds featuring all manner of obstacles and enemies. Your main weapon against the Darkbots is Armillo’s roll, which lets you navigate paths, dodging or wrecking anything in your way. Jump and boost your roll to destroy tougher enemies, or collect power-ups to gain special abilities. Along the way, solve cheeky puzzles and grab orbs, which you can spend on bolstering Armillo’s powers for improved Darkbot routing. And that’s something you’ll need, as you battle multi-stage bosses in their own worlds. Within every level, track down a hidden Parallel World, where you’ll be challenged to speed run through a 2D zone. You’ll need lightning reflexes and your best, old-school platforming skills in these special stages – especially as you’re pushed to beat each stage against the clock! With snappy action, vibrant graphics and puzzles to stretch your mind, Armillo is rolling to defeat the Darkbots in this riveting 3D platformer,

name: Armageddon Operation Dragon
description: All stars and planets in the cosmos eventually come to an end!

name: Ava and Avior Save the Earth
description: Recycle & Save the Earth!

name: Back to Nature
description: Welcome to the farm in the forest. Help Gert the cockerel, Bla the donkey, Rosi the pig and Susi the sheep to find their friend Tom the cat.

name: Best of Board Games: Chess
description: Rediscover all the pleasure of chess in this timeless classic!

name: Best of Arcade Games: Tetraminos
description: Rediscover a timeless puzzle classic with Tetraminos!

name: Best Friends: My Horse 3D
description: Your new best friend will depend on you, and let you ride him, but only if you care for him properly and build his trust. Enter beauty contests and jumping tournaments where you must work together to win, and so much more!

name: Best of Arcade Games: Air Hockey
description: Rediscover a timeless amusement arcade classic with Air Hockey!

name: Best of Arcade Games: Bubble Buster
description: Rediscover a timeless puzzle game with Bubble Buster!

name: Best of Arcade Games: Brick Breaker
description: Rediscover all the pleasure of Breakout in this timeless classic!

name: Bella Sara 2: The Magic of Drasilmare
description: Return to the universe of Bella Sara and set off to the Drasilmare Tree’s rescue! The great Magic Tree of Drasilmare has been cursed! Only you can remove the deadly curse and save the world of Bella Sara.

name: Bingo Party Deluxe
description: The ultimate Bingo game collection! Includes classic Bingo games and an exciting new Bingo Party mode.

name: Bingo Collection
description: Bingo Collection is a pack of three fun games based on the popular game of Bingo!

name: Biker Bash
description: Biker Bash is a frenetic and fun arcade experience that combines Slightly Mad Studios’ history of creating innovative, immersive, and successful racing titles with Gamagio’s focus and technical expertise in the areas of social and mobile.

name: Bike Rider UltraDX: World Tour
description: The ultimate jump action from Japan has reached a new level!

name: Best of Board Games: Mahjong
description: Rediscover all the pleasure of Mahjong in this timeless classic!

name: Best of Board Games: Solitaire
description: Rediscover Solitaire and its most popular variations in this timeless classic!

name: Bit Boy!! Arcade Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Bird Mania Party
description: Take to the bright blue skies and fly the distance!

name: BlayzBloo: Super Melee Action Battle Royale
description: Blayzbloo: Super Melee Action Battle Royale pits Ragna, Rachel, Jin, Noel, Taokak and others against one another in five stages of rumble-and-tumble brawling action to see who's the best.

name: James Bond 007: Blood Stone
description: Blood Stone is a third-person shooter game with elements of hand-to-hand combat. Drive around in multiple vehicles as you and your friends work as a team to attack or defend various spy-themed goals. With up to 16 players in multiplier mode and a team deathmatch as well as other standard game modes there are massive objective-based battles for players to prove they to can be 007!

name: Blocky Bot
description: Super 3D Platform Mini Arcade Action!

name: BlockForm
description: A unique puzzle/platform game where colour affect the character's behaviour. How quickly can you finish this game?

name: Blockado: Puzzle Island
description: Help Valerie escape from a mysterious island by solving puzzles and becoming the ultimate puzzle mastermind.

name: Bloc
description: 4 BLOCS FOR UP TO 4 PLAYERS!

name: Bounce & Break
description: In this Zen world, you will play in four different universes.

name: Boom Boom Squaries
description: Furries are cute, happy and round beings that enjoy rolling around in the sun all day long.

name: BrickBlast U!
description: The Future of Pong is Here Today!

name: Box Pusher
description: There are a whole range of options to make this classic puzzle game even better.

name: Boxzle
description: A beautifully difficult puzzle game.

name: Bugs'N'Balls
description: Bugs'N'Balls is the most played game in the Bug's World.

name: Buddy & Me: Dream Edition
description: An endless dream about friendship

name: Bubble Pop World
description: Bubble Pop World is a 3D match-three game in which you pop bubbles with the same colors.

name: Bubble Gum Popper
description: Tired of the same old boring Matching games? Want something new and exciting? Then check out Bubble Gum Popper, the brand new Matching Game by Skunk Software!

name: Brutus & Futée
description: Brutus & Futée is an adventure puzzle game in which the player takes on the role of the author of an animated series.

name: Brunch Panic
description: Ever dreamed of running your own food truck? Or traveling to the places you've always dreamed about?

name: Cake Ninja XMAS
description: Slide the stylus across the screen to slice snowballs into small pieces like a true Ninja warrior.

name: Cake Ninja 3: The Legend Continues
description: Cake Ninja 3: The Legend Continues is the sequel to the very popular casual game, Cake Ninja, which was among the top 20 of the best-selling Nintendo 3DS games.

name: Cake Ninja 2
description: Cake Ninja 2 is the sequel to the DSiWare original, with more cake-slashing to be done.

name: Cake Ninja
description: Become a true Cake Ninja warrior in this simple, casual slice-em-up game. Cake Ninja invites you to slide the stylus across the screen to slice cakes into small pieces. It’s very easy to play. The more cakes you slice, the longer you stay around. The longer you survive, the higher your score. How long can you last? You can also challenge your friends to a multiplayer game and find out who’s the best player.

name: Canvaleon
description: Canvaleon is a platform and stealth game in which you will step into the shoes of Canvas, a friendly white chameleon, and help him using your abilities and the environment in order to overcome some really dangerous enemies and threats.

name: Candy Match 3
description: Line up the sweets, set off tasty effects and beat the high scores!

name: Candy Hoarder
description: Match your main candy up with the ones on the outside by swiping in their direction. Get power-ups, and try to get the highest score! Share your score on Miiverse!

name: Candle Route
description: Sparky has been entrusted to bring the light to the Crayon Castle before nightfall. The castle is so packed with candles that without your help he'll never make it in time!

name: California Super Sports
description: California Super Sports is a collection of six unique games that are popular in the U.S., Croquet, Dodgeball, Lawndarts, Rollerblade, Shuffleboard Arcade and Target Football.

name: Castle Conqueror: Heroes 2
description: Do you remember the war two years ago?

name: Castle Conqueror: Heroes
description: The great essence of Castle Conqueror is combined with an all new SLG style, delivered in over 20 hours of play time, in Castle Conqueror: Heroes. Enjoy 9 chapters in this story (2 modes of difficulty) as you collect items, upgrade abilities, and slew of other features awaiting your discovery!!!

name: Castle Conqueror: Against
description: You are a great warrior from an ancient tribe on the island.

name: Castelian
description:
You play a small green guy who needs to blow up eight towers, because their presence is somehow poisoning the water of planets which could potentially be ideal colonies. Unfortunately you need to get to the top of these towers to blow them up.

You make your way up to the top of the tower via walkways around the outside of the towers. You need to jump over, kick, and run from various enemies in your journey to the top. Most vertical movement is achieved by jumping onto moving ledges at the right moment.

The game was considered revolutionary in its time for its graphic technique. As the main character walked around the outside of the tower, the character was fixed in the middle of the screen while the tower itself rotated. This gave it a pseudo-3D effect.

Towers are linked together via a voyage through the sea in your trusty MK.7 submarine. This plays out as a side-scrolling collect-'em-up in which bonus points can be obtained.

name: Castle Clout 3D
description: Smash castles, crush enemies and enjoy epic 3D trebuchet action with the release of Castle Clout 3D from California-based game developer Selectsoft!

name: Christmas Adventure of Rocket Penguin

name: Christmas Wonderland 4

name: Christmas Wonderland 3
description: Christmas Wonderland 3 is an indie adventure game crammed full of fabulous HOG scenes, lots of truly superb puzzles for players of all ages, and Santa's Interactive Advent Calendar.

name: Christmas Wonderland 2
description: It's Christmas time and Santa's Elves are working non-stop to get all the toys made in time in Christmas Wonderland 2, an indie adventure game.

name: City Mysteries

name: Chronicles of Vampires: Origins

name: Coaster Crazy Deluxe

name: Comic Workshop

As last of the noble and rare Bronze Dragons, you must defeat the evil SALMU dragons and reclaim the 25 exclusive bronze gems they stole.

Bronze Edition is a cheaper, downloadable, alternate version of Combat of Giants: Dragons, with the same gameplay but fewer features, and some exclusive content.

name: Color Zen Kids
description: For your own Zen masters in training, Color Zen Kids is a fun new twist on the critically acclaimed puzzle game.

name: Cooking Guide: Can't Decide what to Eat?
description: Cooking Guide: Can’t Decide What To Eat? and the Nintendo DS Lite will allow you to experience a simple and convenient way to choose, prepare and cook a variety of 250 international dishes. Preparing breakfast, lunch and dinner with Cooking Guide: Can’t Decide What To Eat? on one of three exciting new Nintendo DS Lite colours of Red, Turquoise or a European first, Green is set to be a whole new mouth watering experience!

name: Crazy Construction

name: Crazy Chicken: Director's Cut 3D
description: The crazy chickens are back and this time they have invaded a movie studio wreaking havoc in every corner.

name: Cosmos X2
description: Enjoy on the go excitement as you take control of the Cosmos X2 and fight back against the alien invasion.

name: Crystal Caverns of Amon-Ra
description: Unlock the riches of the legendary Crystal Caverns of Amon-Ra by capturing the crystal spheres before they reach the Pit of Fire!

name: Cube Life: Island Survival HD

Players will embark on this epic journey as Ayamei Shimata a seemingly ordinary young girl that soon becomes known throughout the land as The Dragon Princess. The story begins on a warm summer night during Ayamei’s childhood, a night that started no different from any other but was soon to be one she would never forget.

name: Dairojo! Samurai Defenders
description: Dairojo!

name: Deep Sea Creatures
description: The mystery of the Deep Sea and its species in the Palm of Your Hands.

name: Decathlon 2012
description: Ashton Eaton’s world record of 9039 points is shaking at its roots.

name: Devil Band - Rock the Underworld
description: The Apocalypse is upon us…

name: Densetsu no Starfy 4
description: Densetsu no Starfy 4 is a platforming video game developed by TOSE and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS. It is the fourth game in the The Legendary Starfy series, which first started on the Game Boy Advance. As with the other games in the series, Densetsu no Starfy 4 features Starfy as the main character. He is joined by his sister Starpy and his friend Kyorosuke the clam. The three of them help out other undersea creatures and fights numerous villains.

name: Denpa Ningen no RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Demonic Karma Summoner
description: A game about passwords, spells, platforming, and dressing demonic animals in kawaii clothes. Use your virtual blood to summon animal demons in the Karmarealm. Dress them in kawaii clothes to help them on the platforming adventure. Collect scrolls along the way as you discover what happened to the KarmaSlayer (humanity's only hope).

name: Discolight
description: Party on, change your very own Nintendo DSi into a discolight.

name: Dinox
description: Dinosaurs are a known phenomenon amongst us, but did you know that a Tyrannosaurus rex could have bitten through a car? It could easily eat the whole thing!

name: Dictionary 6 in 1 with Camera Function

name: Did It Myself ABC123

name: Frozen: Olaf's Quest
description: In this humorous epilogue to the motion picture, ‘Disney Frozen: Olaf’s Quest’ hands center spotlight to Olaf, the outgoing, innocent and comically carefree snowman from Disney’s epic comedy adventure. It pairs tightly tuned platforming action with light puzzle-solving elements across 60 imaginative levels, complete with hidden collectibles, side challenges and unlockable customization items.

name: Disney Fireworks
description:
Light up the night with Disney Fireworks!

Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls... Touch and flick to trigger a dazzling night-time extravaganza of colour and fun with Disney Fireworks! Aim rockets to their matching colours in the sky to ignite an explosion and score points. Time them perfectly to improve your WOW!

name: Don't Touch Anything Red
description: Fast gameplay and 5 player multiplayer! Just don't forget one thing... Don't Touch Anything Red!

name: Don't Cross the Line
description: Don't Cross The Line is a puzzle game in which the player must connect lines to various boxes, from one identical box to another, without crossing the lines they draw in the process. There are roughly 50 stages in all. Depending on how quickly you complete each stage, you'll be awarded with a bronze, silver or gold award. To unlock additional stages, players must achieve a certain ranking in previous stages. Can you outwit the puzzles at hand and receive gold awards all around?

name: Don't Crash Go
description: This is the only rule of the game. Move left and right to change lanes, collect coins, and avoid a crash at all costs.

name: DodoGo! Robo

name: DodoGo! Challenge

description: Divergent Shift is a 2D puzzle platformer developed in which players must use the two screens in tandem to successfully navigate across. It follows the adventure of a girl who must find the pieces of a powerful mirror to bring back together a world that has been split.

name: Doodle Dash
description: Doodle Dash is a multiplayer, drawing-based, party game exclusively for the Wii U.

name: Donkey Kong: Original Edition
description:
Journey back to the beginning of Mario's career, when the plucky hero single-handedly took on the mighty Donkey Kong for the very first time!

This game is a port of the original Donkey Kong arcade, which is different from the NES version.

name: Electroplankton Nanocarp

name: Epic Word Search Collection 2

Epic Word Search puzzles are huge - and they're back in this second epic collection!

The Epic America Word Search: Celebrate the very best of America - with fireworks! Travel Route 66, head west for the Gold Rush and explore America's parks and beaches; take in a ball game, eat the ultimate hamburger and look up at skyscrapers. They even put a man on the moon - can you find him?

name: Epic Word Search Collection
description: Epic Word Search puzzles are huge!

name: European Conqueror 3D
description: European Conqueror 3D is a new strategy game set during World War II.

name: Escape Trick: The Secret of Rock City Prison

name: Faceez

name: Faceez: Monsters!

FighterZ Pass (8 new characters)
Anime Music Pack (available by March 1st 2018)
Commentator Voice Pack (available by April 15th 2018)

description: Sin descripción

To celebrate the 25th anniversary of the Super Nintendo version of game, Microïds is releasing a Collector's Edition (in Europe and Australia), which includes the game in physical edition, a retro cartridge style metal case, an exclusive numbered metal card, a 24-page retro-style instruction booklet, the digital soundtrack (remastered version). Pre-orders are now open!

In the Nintendo Switch version of Flashback, players will be able to choose between the original 1993 gaming experience and Modern mode, which contains:

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: FighterZ Edition

name: Fizz

name: Forgotten Legions

name: Flowerworks HD: Follie's Adventure
description: Follie has mysteriously crashed on an unknown planet. Solve the mystery and help Follie escape!

name: Football Up Online

name: Flips: The Magic Faraway Tree
description: Jo, Bessie and Fanny take their cousin Rick on an adventure he’ll never forget to the magic Faraway Tree, where he meets Moon-Face, Silky the fairy and Saucepan Man.

name: Flip the Core
description: Before the Big Bang shaped the universe as we know it, a place existed with fewer dimensions than we have today.

name: Frederic 2: Evil Strikes Back
description: Defeat famous opponents in musical duels. Immerse yourself in the fantastic story of Frederic's endeavours. Catch all the Easter Eggs and subtle parodies hidden in the background. Practice your skills until perfection and become the Master of the Piano.

name: Freddie Flintoff's Power Play Cricket
description: Play as Freddie Flintoff and become an integral player for England in this fast moving, high scoring arcade cricket game.

name: Frat Party Games: Pong Toss
description: Pony up - it’s Pong Toss time. Compete against your friends or the computer in this ultimate party-game favorite.

name: Frag doch mal...die Maus!
description: Everyone in the German speaking territory grew up with the Maus. The show "Die Sendung mit der Maus" by German public TV station WDR is on TV for over 40 years. Quarterly a Saturday prime time live Quiz show is produced by WDR, which is the basis for this Quiz game. Originally released on PC in in 2008 it earned many game awards including "Best German Kids Game 2008". This completely redesigned product returns with many new features and is available for mobile devices for the first time. Hours of fun are waiting for kids and parents answering about 1000 questions and with approximately two hours of original video content with the famous "Sachgeschichten by Christoph and Armin".

name: Four Bombs
description: Watch your mark with Four Bombs! Carefully scan the mine field for bombs by learning a common pattern among surrounding spaces. Find all 4 bombs and win - levels randomly generated for endless fun!

name: Gabrielle's Ghostly Groove Mini
description: Terror Up the Dance Floor!

name: G.G Series All Breaker
description: Break all target blocks in each stage!

name: Fuze4 Nintendo Switch
description: FUZE4 Nintendo Switch is a coding application for Nintendo Switch. It has been designed and developed by a team of experienced gamers, programmers, artists and educators. The end result is a language ideally suited to coding games and apps for absolute beginners and seasoned programmers alike.

name: Funky Physics
description: In this simple yet challenging physics-based game your goal is to remove all the green blocks from the screen.

name: Funfair Party Games
description: Multiplayer fun at the fair with movement control and eleven amazing attractions!

name: Six Flags Fun Park
description: Six Flags Fun Park brings the entire amusement park onto gaming systems everywhere for the first time! Take a stroll through a familiar world filled with your favorite amusement park games all re-imagined and within a colossal park environment that is sure to keep gamers challenged. Along the way, players will be able to explore the expansive park, customize their characters and play against friends and family with 40 mini games. Enter the fun park and experience all that Six Flags has to offer within your home.

name: Frontier Days - Founding Pioneers
description: "New Frontier Days ~Founding Pioneers~" is a town-building simulation game, where you command your pioneers to colonize a new land. The pioneers are capable of "Logging", "Mining", "Hunting", "Fishing", and many others. Command them accordingly, and build your own town efficiently! From the materials gathered via the actions of your pioneers, you can then use them to "Build"! With the buildings, you can then process logs into lumber, weave wool into textiles, grow plants with the Field and many more! Make your town thrive with all these useful buildings! You can also keep wild animals as pets too! Pets can go out with the pioneers to gather materials, or they can help in hunting, and even allow pioneers to ride on their backs! As you progress in colonizing the land, you may obtain "Invention Cards" along the way. These cards provide various effects, such as shortening your farm harvesting time cycle, and increasing the fishing time and etc. There are over 290 cards in the game! Use them wisely! 3 Game Modes are in the game. First, there is the Story Mode, where you set out with the help of your lovely assistant, Jessica, to build your dream town from scratch, overcome all sorts of obstacles, and aim to develop into a city. Then, there is the Survival Mode, where you can choose from 5 levels of difficulty to suit your pace of gameplay. Lastly, the Free Mode has no Game Overs, and you can use whichever Invention Cards you have obtained freely. You choose how…

name: Go Fetch!
description: The idea of Go Fetch! is simple yet entertaining.

name: Gemology
description: Excitement and intrigue 1,000 ft. below!

name: Galaxy Blaster Code Red
description: In Galaxy Blaster Code Red, you must defend your ship from the oncoming alien ships. Move your paddle left or right then tap the screen to fire the blaster. Be careful, if the target enters your base, or you miss the targets too many times, it's game over!

name: Gummy Bears Mini Golf
description: Transport yourself to a wonderful fairy tale land full of color and cheer!

name: Guac' a Mole
description: In a swirly, goofy universe so far away it's unlikely to even exist... You are a doomed planet. Hideous avocado mutants are destroying you from the inside, and a persistent meteor rain is raging down on you.

name: Hints Hunter
description: Hints Hunter is an easy, casual game that you can play anytime and anywhere.

name: Humanitarian Helicopter
description: Two pilots, James and Ben, are on a quest to help survivors of earthquakes in California. Each of them learns to help instead of harm survivors. Having a helicopter the player rescues people by transporting them to survived houses, supplying additionally food for them. They overcome difficulties such as strong wind, wild animals willing to takeover over discharged food, closed gates to settlements. The aim of the game is to form only positive character traits. There are 50 levels, 3 modes of difficulties and 8 skills who can be employed to improve performance in the game. Game offers an option of off-TV play as well.

name: HullBreach: Uncloaked
description: An updated version of Wii Browser MMORPG HullBreach Online.

name: HTR High Tech Racing
description: High Tech Racing is a Slot Car Racing Simulator, a virtual version of the classic toy of the 80s and 90s. HTR offers 3 different difficulty levels and 18 tracks that include several challenges like loops, jumps, crossroads, narrows, and high-speed curves. You can even build your own tracks with the highly intuitive Track Editor. Choose from 3 in-game visualization modes, from a 3rd-person perspective to an in-car camera.

name: House M.D.: Episode 4 - Crashed
description: Dr. Gregory House and his elite diagnostic team race against the clock to unravel an all-new medical mystery.

name: House M.D.: Episode 3 - Skull and Bones
description: Dr. Gregory House and his elite diagnostic team race against the clock to unravel an all-new medical mystery.

name: House M.D.: Episode 2 - Blue Meanie
description: Join Dr. House and his diagnostic team and race against the clock to solve an all-new medical mystery.

name: House M.D.: Episode 1 - Globetrotting
description: In House, M.D. – Globetrotting, Dr. House and the team meet Henry, an aging television archaeologist who's more concerned about saving face than saving his own life.

name: Hospital Havoc
description: Do you have what it takes to run your very own heart-pumping hospital?

name: Hot Rod Racer

name: Horse Vet 3D
description: Experience the daily life of a veterinarian – specialized in horses!

name: Hockey Allstar Shootout
description: Use the Wii Remote™ controller as a stick and take the shot as you compete in three exciting Hockey Skills Challenges. In Head 2 Head, it’s just you versus the best goalies in the world in a five-puck shootout. Race against the clock to post the most goals in the fastest time. The three difficulty levels will place you against three increasingly talented goalies, each donning the jersey of their home country.

name: Hit Ninja

name: Hitori by Nikoli
description: With the Nikoli puzzle series, you can enjoy high-quality "Sudoku" puzzles, created by Nikoli, who gave the world-famous puzzle its name.

name: Ikibago

You play the game by training your kemono, using it to explore the planet, and transforming it with mixes. Mixes in particular change the kemono’s appearance and skills, and can be used to make kemonos stronger.

In the game, the player’s goals are to explore the planet within 2000 days, and to collect spaceship parts and return home to Earth.

name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games: Arcade Edition
description: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games: Arcade Edition is a game based on the 2016 Olympic games, with a Mario and Sonic twist. This is similar to the console versions of the game, but different in many ways. The game is controlled with your feet for running in sports like 100m, and swimming in 100m Freestyle Swimming. The rotating sticks are used for throwing in Hammer Throw and Javelin Throw. It can also be used for tricks on the trampoline. Some games require you to jump on the machine, but primarily for Long Jump and Hurdles. Buttons are found on the joysticks for firing for precision sports like Archery and Rhythmic Gymnastics. You can play as every single character found in the console version, but there are no guest characters. You can only play one event at a time, or you have to put in more credits. There are also no Dream Events, and the three main sports from the console game are missing due to their complex control: Soccer/Football, Volleyball, and Rugby.

name: Nintendo Labo: Toy-Con 02 - Robot Kit
description:
Make a Toy-Con Robot suit…to become a robot in the game! Fold engineered, pre-cut cardboard sheets by following interactive instructions and then suit up to get playing. Thanks to the adjustable straps, one size fits all! Wreck in-game environments and beat challenges to unlock powerful abilities. Then, discover how the Toy-Con Robot comes to life with Nintendo Switch technology and, in Toy-Con Garage, invent new ways to play!

Bust out your own markers, stickers, and more to customize your Toy-Con Robot suit—or enter the Hanger to customize your in-game robot’s appearance. By moving your hands and feet, you can manoeuvre the robot in the game, unleash your moves, or make sound effects! As you play, keep track of your robot’s rank, points earned, and unlocked special abilities. Discover the mechanics behind the Toy-Con Robot and how the Nintendo Switch technology brings it to life. If you’re feeling competitive, take on a friend with their own Toy-Con Robot* in a two-player battle mode on a single screen! Then go beyond in the included Toy-Con Garage mode to invent new ways to play with your Toy-Con Robot or create your very own Toy-Con projects.

name: Nintendo Labo: Toy-Con 01 - Variety Kit
description:
Make two Toy-Con RC Cars, a Fishing Rod, a Motorbike, a House, and a Piano using engineered, pre-cut cardboard sheets and fun, interactive instructions. Then, Play! Steer the RC Car, reel in fish from the ocean, drive your Motorbike, interact with a creature in the House, and play tunes on the Piano. Then, discover how it all comes to life with Nintendo Switch technology and, in Toy-Con Garage, invent new ways to play!

Grab your own markers, stickers, and more to customize your Toy-Con creations. Steer the Toy-Con RC Car manually, have it self-drive, or challenge a friend to a match with two Toy-Con RC Cars*. Race the CPU with the Toy-Con Motorbike, collect targets on bumpy terrain, or create your own tracks. Catch in-game fish with the Toy-Con Fishing Rod, then view what you’ve caught or create original fish with Toy-Con Piano in Aquarium mode! You can also play quick tunes with Toy-Con Piano, or record your own music. Insert blocks into your Toy-Con House to feed a creature, play minigames with it, and who knows what else! Then go beyond in the included Toy-Con Garage mode to invent new ways to play with each Toy-Con project in the Variety Kit or create your very own!

name: PixelMaker
description: PixelMaker is a drawing program designed specifically for making pixel art!

name: Pocket Pack: Words & Numbers
description: Pocket Pack: Words & Numbers is a collection of popular word and number games. Choose from a variety of games such as: Anagrams, Sudoku, Kakuro, Word Cubes and Word Guess.

name: Pop-Up Pirate!
description: Everyone can have barrels of fun playing in Pop-Up Party mode, or enjoy a rollicking one-player game in Pop-Up Logic mode. Players must poke through the barrel that holds their Captain captive, being careful not to harm the man himself! Unique Wii features add to the excitement, making for a fun-packed party game. Try swapping out the Captain and putting a Mii in the barrel for some real laughs!

name: Poptropica: Forgotten Islands
description: Climb aboard your almighty blimp and explore the vast uncharted islands of Poptropica. Steer clear of hazards and discover exotic islands beneath the clouds. Take to the islands and embark on quests while discovering the secrets of Poptropica’s past, one artifact at a time. Poptropica: Forgotten Islands on Nintendo 3DS is an adaptation of the popular virtual world for kids. Customize your avatar and travel on foot or by blimp across multiple islands. Collect artifacts and other items and discover the mystery of the Forgotten Islands!

name: Prism Pets
description: Prism Pets, a colorfully cute puzzle that shines. Slide, smash and crash your way into color!

name: Publisher Dream
description: Ever dream about making and publishing your digital games? Now you can!

name: Psyscrolr
description: A platformer game with puzzles separating the diverse combat layouts of its levels.

name: Psibo
description: Psibo is a game that mashes together mechanics of many timeless arcade classics in a new, sleek form. Fight your way through the hexagonal defense systems of the universe in the original levels, or try to get the highest score in the endless mode!

name: Project Colour Park
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Cider
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Rocks
description: A novel puzzle game that will thoroughly test your combining and planning abilities.

name: Puzzle & Dragons Z + Puzzle & Dragons: Super Mario Bros. Edition
description: Role-playing elements and match-three puzzle fun meet in Puzzle & Dragons Z + Puzzle & Dragons: Super Mario Bros. Edition. In a single package containing both games, explore dungeons, command monsters and master all types of elemental Orbs to defeat the enemy hordes!

name: Quadcopter Pilot Challenge
description: Are you the top quadcopter pilot? Test yourself in over 200 challenges.

name: Puzzle Series Vol. 2: Illust Logic + Colourful Logic
description: The DS releases Illust Logic and Colourful Logic collected together for the Wii. Over 600 picross puzzles included! Unfortunately no release plans known for North America or PAL territories.

name: Rakoo & Friends
description: Driven by his unrequited romantic yearnings, the charming but not very smart Rakoo leaves his cosy, comfortable home in search of that special someone.
